name: Warwick
what_you_do: Warwick Fairfax is a life coach and founder of Beyond the Crucible, dedicated to helping individuals uncover their unique paths to significance and purpose through storytelling and self-discovery.
who_you_serve: He serves individuals seeking personal growth and transformation, particularly those who have experienced failures or losses in their lives.
signature_programs: Crucible Leadership: Embrace Your Trials to Lead a Life of Significance, Discover Your Second-Act Significance e-course
current_projects: Groundbreaking quantitative study on how people experience and deal with crucible moments, results to be released later in 2023.
social_proof: Wall Street Journal bestselling author, ICF-certified coach, featured on ABC, CBS, NBC, and The Associated Press.
bio: Wall Street Journal bestselling author, ICF-certified coach, featured on ABC, CBS, NBC, and The Associated Press.
business_focus: Warwick Fairfax is a life coach and founder of Beyond the Crucible, dedicated to helping individuals uncover their unique paths to significance and purpose through storytelling and self-discovery. (life coaching)
